data.name: SapiErrorDuplicateResourceName
data.value: A resource name was duplicated for a given rule.

data.name: SapiErrorTooManyGrammars
data.value: Too many grammars have been loaded. Number of grammars cannot exceed 1024.

data.name: SapiErrorCircularReference
data.value: Circular reference in import rules of grammars.

data.name: SapiErrorInvalidImport
data.value: A rule reference to an imported grammar cannot be resolved.

data.name: SapiErrorInvalidWAVFile
data.value: The format of the WAV file is not supported.

data.name: RequestPending
data.value: A Speech Recognizer method called with the SPRIF_ASYNC flag is being processed.

data.name: SapiErrorAllWordsOptional
data.value: A grammar rule was defined with a null path through the rule.

data.name: SapiErrorInstanceChangeInvalid
data.value: SelectEngine called while a recognition context exists, or SetInput called in the shared instance case.

data.name: SapiErrorRuleNameIdConflict
data.value: A rule exists with matching IDs (names) but different names (IDs).

data.name: SapiErrorNoRules
data.value: A grammar contains no top-level, dynamic, or exported rules.

data.name: SapiErrorCircularRuleRef
data.value: Rule 'A' refers to a second rule 'B' which, in turn, refers to rule 'A'.

data.name: NoParseFound
data.value: Parse path cannot be parsed given the currently active rules.

data.name: SapiErrorInvalidHandle
data.value: Invalid handle.

data.name: SapiErrorRemoteCallTimedout
data.value: A marshaled remote call failed to respond.

data.name: SapiErrorAudioBufferOverflow
data.value: Input stream is paused because the Speech Recognizer driver has not retrieved data recently.

data.name: SapiErrorNoAudioData
data.value: The result does not contain any audio, nor does the portion of the element chain of the result contain any audio.

data.name: SapiErrorDeadAlternate
data.value: This alternate is no longer a valid alternate to the result it was obtained from.

data.name: SapiErrorHighLowConfidence
data.value: The result does not contain any audio, nor does the portion of the element chain of the result contain any audio.

data.name: SapiErrorInvalidFormatString
data.value: The XML format string for this 'ruleref' is not valid. It must be a 'Guid' or 'RefClsId'.

data.name: SPNotSupportedOnStreamInput
data.value: The operation is not supported for stream input.

data.name: SapiErrorAppLexReadOnly
data.value: The operation is invalid for all but newly created application lexicons.

data.name: SapiErrorNoTerminatingRulePath
data.value: Terminating rule path is missing.

data.name: WordExistsWithoutPronunciation
data.value: The word exists but without pronunciation.

data.name: SapiErrorStreamClosed
data.value: Cannot perform operation on a closed stream object.

data.name: SapiErrorNoMoreItems
data.value: When enumerating items, the requested index is greater than the count of items.

data.name: SapiErrorNotFound
data.value: Cannot find the requested data item, such as a data key or value.

data.name: SapiErrorInvalidAudioState
data.value: Audio state passed to SetState() is invalid.

data.name: SapiErrorGenericMMSYS
data.value: MMSYS error occurred.

data.name: SapiErrorMarshalerException
data.value: An error occurred during a call to the marshaling code

data.name: SapiErrorNotDynamicGrammar
data.value: Attempt was made to manipulate a non-dynamic grammar.

data.name: SapiErrorAmbiguousProperty
data.value: Cannot add ambiguous property.

data.name: SapiErrorInvalidRegistrykey
data.value: The key specified is invalid.

data.name: SapiErrorInvalidTokenId
data.value: The token specified is invalid.

data.name: SapiErrorXMLBadSyntax
data.value: The XML parser failed due to bad syntax.

data.name: SapiErrorXMLResourceNotFound
data.value: The XML parser cannot find a required resource, such as a voice or a phonetic converter.

data.name: SapiErrorTokenInUse
data.value: Attempted to remove registry data from a token that is already in use elsewhere.

data.name: SapiErrorTokenDeleted
data.value: Cannot perform action on this object because its associated registry key was deleted.

data.name: SapiErrorMultilingualNotSupported
data.value: The selected voice was registered as multilingual. SAPI does not support multilingual registration.

data.name: SapiErrorExportDynamicRule
data.value: Exported rules cannot refer directly or indirectly to a dynamic rule.

data.name: SapiErrorSTGF
data.value: Error parsing the SAPI Text Grammar Format (XML grammar).

data.name: SapiErrorWordFormat
data.value: Incorrect word format, probably due to incorrect pronunciation string.

data.name: SapiErrorStreamNotActive
data.value: Methods associated with active audio stream cannot be called unless stream is active.

data.name: SapiErrorEngineResponseInvalid
data.value: Arguments or data supplied by the engine are in an invalid format or are inconsistent.

data.name: SapiErrorSREngineException
data.value: Error during a call to the current Speech Recognizer engine.

data.name: SapiErrorStreamPosInvalid
data.value: Stream position information supplied from engine is inconsistent.

data.name: SapiErrorRecognizerInactive
data.value: Operation could not be completed because the recognizer is inactive.

data.name: SapiErrorRemoteCallOnWrongThread
data.value: Remote call to the server was made on the wrong thread.

data.name: SapiErrorRemoteProcessTerminated
data.value: The remote process terminated unexpectedly.

data.name: SapiErrorRemoteProcessAlreadyRunning
data.value: The remote process is already running; it cannot be started a second time.

data.name: SapiErrorLangIdMismatch
data.value: The language for the grammar does not match the language of the speech recognizer.

data.name: SapiErrorPartialParseFound
data.value: A grammar-ending parse does not use all available words.

data.name: SapiErrorNotTopLevelRule
data.value: Only a top-level rule can be activated or deactivated.

data.name: SapiErrorNoRuleActive
data.value: Cannot parse until a rule is active.

data.name: SapiErrorLexRequiresCookie
data.value: Cannot request all words at once from a container lexicon.

data.name: SapiErrorStreamUninitialized
data.value: The local recognizer cannot activate a rule, dictation, or other stream until it is initialized. Call SetInput first.

data.name: SapiErrorNotSupportedLang
data.value: The requested language is not supported.

data.name: SapiErrorVoicePaused
data.value: The operation cannot be performed because the voice is currently paused.

data.name: SapiErrorAudioBufferUnderflow
data.value: The real-time audio device stopped returning expected data.

data.name: SapiErrorAudioStoppedUnexpectedly
data.value: An audio device stopped returning data from the Read method even though it is in the run state.

data.name: SapiErrorNoWordPronunciation
data.value: The Speech Recognizer engine is unable to add this word to a grammar. The application may need to supply an explicit pronunciation for this word.

data.name: SapiErrorAlternatesWouldBeInconsistent
data.value: The Speech Recognizer engine is unable to add this word to a grammar. The application may need to supply an explicit pronunciation for this word.

data.name: SapiErrorNotSupportedForSharedRecognizer
data.value: The method called is not supported for the shared recognizer.

data.name: SapiErrorTimeOut
data.value: A task could not complete because the Speech Recognizer engine had timed out.

data.name: SapiErrorReenterSynchronize
data.value: A Speech Recognizer engine called synchronize while inside of a synchronize call.

data.name: SapiErrorStateWithNoArcs
data.value: The grammar contains a node that does not have arcs.

data.name: SapiErrorNotActiveSession
data.value: Audio output and input are not supported for non-active console sessions.

data.name: SapiErrorAlreadyDeleted
data.value: The object is a stale reference and is invalid to use.

data.name: SapiErrorAudioStopped
data.value: Stream is stopped during read or write call.

data.name: SapiErrorRecoXMLGenerationFail
data.value: The Recognition Parse Tree couldn't be generated.

data.name: SapiErrorSMLGenerationFail
data.value: The Semantic Markup Language cannot be generated. This may be caused by an XLST template that is not formed correctly.

data.name: SapiErrorNotPromptVoice
data.value: The current voice is not a prompt voice.

data.name: SapiErrorRootRuleAlreadyDefined
data.value: There is already a root rule for this grammar.

data.name: SapiErrorScriptDisallowed
data.value: Support for embedded script not supported because browser security settings have disabled it.

data.name: SapiErrorRemoteCallTimedOutStart
data.value: A timeout occurred starting the SAPI Server.

data.name: SapiErrorRemoteCallTimedOutConnect
data.value: A timeout occurred obtaining the lock for starting or connecting to SAPI Server.

data.name: SapiErrorSecMgrChangeNotAllowed
data.value: The security manager cannot be changed while a grammar is loaded.

data.name: SapiErrorCompleteButExtendable
data.value: Parse is valid but could be extensible (internal use only)

data.name: SapiErrorFailedToDeleteFile
data.value: Tried and failed to delete an existing file.

data.name: SapiErrorSharedEngineDisabled
data.value: The user has chosen to disable speech from running on the machine, or the system is not set up to run speech.

data.name: SapiErrorRecognizerNotFound
data.value: No recognizer is installed.

data.name: SapiErrorAudioNotFound
data.value: No audio device is installed.

data.name: SapiErrorNoVowel
data.value: Word must contain a vowel.

data.name: SapiErrorNotSupportedPhoneme
data.value: Unknown phoneme.

data.name: SapiErrorNoRulesToActivate
data.value: The grammar does not have any root or top-level active rules to activate.

data.name: SapiErrorNoWordEntryNotification
data.value: The engine does not need SAPI word entry handles for this grammar.

data.name: SapiErrorWordNeedsNormalization
data.value: Must normalize word before passing to the GetPronunciations interface.

data.name: SapiErrorCannotNormalize
data.value: The word passed to the normalize interface cannot be normalized.

data.name: LimitReached
data.value: The word being normalized has generated more than the maximum number of allowed normalized results.

data.name: NotSupported
data.value: This combination of function call and input is not supported.

data.name: SapiErrorTopicNotAdaptable
data.value: This topic cannot be modified.

data.name: SapiErrorPhonemeConversion
data.value: Cannot convert the phonemes to the specified phonetic alphabet.

data.name: SapiErrorNotSupportedForInprocRecognizer
data.value: The method called is not supported for the in-process recognizer.

data.name: SapiLexInvalidData
data.value: The lexicon data is invalid or corrupted.

data.name: SapiLexUnexpectedFormat
data.value: The lexicon is not in the expected format.

data.name: SapiNonWordTransition
data.value: One of the parse transitions is not a word transition.

data.name: SapiSisrAttributesNotAllowed
data.value: Attributes are not allowed at the top level.

data.name: SapiSisrMixedNotAllowed
data.value: Mixed content is not allowed at the top level.

data.name: SapiStringEmpty
data.value: The string cannot be empty.

data.name: SapiStringTooLong
data.value: The string is too long.

data.name: SapiVoiceNotFound
data.value: No given voice is found.

data.name: SapiErrorOverload
data.value: The operation cannot be carried out due to overload and should be attempted again.

data.name: SapiConfigInvalidData
data.value: The data in the CFG grammar is invalid or corrupted.
